sections.heading: Continuation
sections.text:
of Camp as part of cooperative extension work of Nevada System of Higher

Education.

sections.heading: State
sections.text: 4-H Camp Advisory Council: Creation; number, terms and selection of members.

sections.heading: Donations
sections.text: and gifts for development and operation of property of Camp.

sections.heading: Use
sections.text: of Camp by public and private organizations; disposition of rents and charges.

sections.heading: Lease,
sections.text:
exchange or sale of real property of Camp by Board of Regents; conditions;

disposition of proceeds.

sections.heading: Acquisition
sections.text: or granting of rights-of-way; utilities; adjustment of boundaries.

sections.heading: Erection
sections.text: of buildings on Camp property by counties.
